articles.description: “Screening wouldn’t have crossed our minds for Jay, when he was diagnosed at 41.”
articles.content:
• Katie Couric opened up about losing her first husband Jay Monahan to colon cancer.
  • The former Today host is encouraging others to get early screenings after Monahan developed stage 4 … [+4602 chars]
